/* selectFarm */ SELECT a.work_seq workSeq , a.serial_no serialNo , a.farm_no farmNo , (SELECT connection_status FROM tb_farm WHERE serial_no = a.serial_no AND connection_status IS NOT NULL AND reg_dtm >= DATE_ADD(NOW(), interval -10 minute) ORDER BY work_seq DESC LIMIT 1) connectionStatus , (SELECT status FROM tb_farm WHERE serial_no = a.serial_no AND status IS NOT NULL AND reg_dtm >= DATE_ADD(NOW(), interval -10 minute) ORDER BY work_seq DESC LIMIT 1) status , a.input_count inputCount , a.water_qntty waterQntty , a.type type , a.reg_dtm regDtm , a.mod_dtm modDtm FROM tb_farm a WHERE a.serial_no = #{serialNo} AND a.farm_no = #{farmNo} AND a.type = #{type} AND a.reg_dtm >= DATE_ADD(NOW(), interval -10 minute) ORDER BY a.work_seq DESC LIMIT 1
